content:
{"name": "CCCS BRONX FOOD PANTRY", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Effective immediately, all clients are required to have the following in order to take part in the Food Pantry distribution.
Up to date state ID with picture and address. The address must be from the Borough of The Bronx (Should your ID not have a current address The Bronx; you must provide a utility bill in your name with The Bronx address)
Once registered, you will get a client card, which you must bring every month. Should you lose or forget your client card, you must provide a proper ID to receive service.
All addresses and all household members (including spouses and children) must
be registered and updated in full, or service will be refused. It is only one card per household
If you are a Home attendant, you must bring your home attendant's ID and clig ID.
Please bring a shopping cart for your convenience. 
Please wear a mask and keep the social distance. The Food Pantry is only once a month per household", "email": "", "url": "https://cccsny.org/services/neighborhood-centers-south-bronx", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": null, "address_2": null, "city": null, "state_province": null, "postal_code": null, "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": null, "longitude": null}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 292-9090", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "20:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}]}
